name: The Path to Evil
description:
“The flow between power and movement. A world of corruption and a spark of kindness.”

Evil was sealed away hundreds of years ago and so its anger and madness and pain have started seeping through the cracks of its prison. Our kindly hero has decided to release it from its cruel punishment by taking in and dispelling the suffering wich took the form of corrupted creatures and is swarming the land.

Join our kindly hero in a short but impactful 2D brawler set in an increasingly corrupted forest. Fight against waves of enemies with the goal of restoring the environment and freeing the forest from its curse.

Will our hero reach this evil and free it from it's prison? Can you stop the corruption?
